solution_line_template: 1 truck uses {tanks_per_truck} tanks of {liters_per_tank} liters, so a truck can carry {tanks_per_truck} tanks per truck * {liters_per_tank} liters = <<{tanks_per_truck}*{liters_per_tank}={liters_per_truck}>>{liters_per_truck} liters per truck.
The total amount of water the {num_trucks} trucks carry is {num_trucks} trucks * {liters_per_truck} liters per truck= <<{num_trucks}*{liters_per_truck}={total_liters}>>{total_liters} liters.
